explanation: [0-0] A young boy stands on a dirt road by the river, a pair of sandals beside his feet, standing on a red blanket. The boy is wearing a black hat and a blue robe. His head is slightly lowered, his arms are folded across his abdomen, and beside him is a pole tied with many colorful balloons.

[0-6] Then a man in brown clothes rides a motorcycle and stops behind the little boy. Then the man takes a screwdriver in his right hand and bursts a balloon tied to the pole. The balloon bursts with a bang. Immediately afterwards, he bursts other balloons one after another, the balloons bursting one by one, making a crackling sound. At the same time, the little boy bends down and looks at the red blanket on the ground.
